comments.raw_text:
We'd like to create a video about how people can test the Nightly build that we can post on the Nightly first run page.  

Juan and Marcia said they would put some notes together and I've scheduled some time on July 21 for filming.  

Opening this bug to keep track of things.
comments.author: davidwboswell@yahoo.com
